text: Very easy process and very reasonable price, book my appointment online and make sure to do the registration online! It will make the process extremely fast! I did everything a week before I heading to the US, and US only requires Rapid antigens test 1 day before boarding. So I just walk in, paid, and they swab me, I waited 20 minutes for my hard copy result. Extremely efficient!

This clinic is difficult to find. Please see the attached pictures.
I took normal PCR test and result is sent via email very quick than I expected.

There many curious massage shop in the same building. Be careful not going to the dark area.

Went on Christmas Day to take PCR for japan trip on 27th. Found this place by googling 24/7 PCR clinic. Saw online need appt slots but decided to head down try my luck. They had a short queue but it moved fast. Queued at 6.15pm, done by 6.45pm. $65 + $10 festive charge. Received my certificate via email that night at 1am, faster than the 24h expected time! Reliable and super efficient üëçüèªüëçüèª Kudos to the team for working so hard even during holiday period.

Saw the reviews from other people. Found it kinda difficult to believe the reliability. But honestly, it was a smooth process. Book appt to be safe. My first time doing swab test, I thought they will insert it all the way into the nose. Even art test we have to insert into the nose deeper.  I asked the swabber whether is it normal. He said that's how it is done. So I was fine with it. It's so much more cheaper compared to other places. Only $65. Other places charged $77- $90 ++. And they also send it after 8 hours on the same day itself! Even though it stated 24 hrs! Amazed by the efficiency.

Good value, efficient and fast results. Hygienic and well run testing shop, helpful staff and info support made whole process easy. The nasal swab was performed professionally, felt extremely comfortable compared to many I‚Äôve had in past. The 24Hr guaranteed result actually arrived email about 8hrs later which was a pleasant surprise.
Finally do remember this place is located in People‚Äôs Park CENTRE (I went into the nearby People‚Äôs Park Complex by mistake first try). Happy Travels !!
